name: Densetsu no Oga Batoru Gaiden Zenobia no Oji
name_original: Densetsu no Oga Batoru Gaiden Zenobia no Oji
description: 'Densetsu no Oga Batoru Gaiden Zenobia no Oji' (otherwise known as 伝説のオウガバトル外伝 ゼノビアの皇子) is a Japanese real-time strategy RPG video game created for the Neo Geo Pocket Color (NGP forwards compatible). Released on June 22nd, 2000, it was developed and published by SNK. It is the only game in the series to not receive localization outside of Japan.
